MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power fault in CH46 & CH47  postcode areas of Wirral. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:54PM. Our engineers are on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, we expect the power to be restored by 1AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:48PM on 1st February 2021
